'''Tall Wooden Pole''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Tall Wooden Pole is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=80}}.
